attributes.action: introduce compulsary 'check driving tests' or 'driving assesments' for all drivers every 5 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The test or assesment would help to ensure that the standard of driving after the learner test would progress. A grading system could be implemented so that insurance companies could offer discounts for higher grade drivers

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
